Package cs350s22.component.sensor.reporter

Class ReporterChange

java.lang.Object
cs350s22.component.sensor.reporter.A_Reporter
cs350s22.component.sensor.reporter.ReporterChange
public class ReporterChange extends A_Reporter
Defines a change reporter that sends a message whenever the current value it is monitoring differs by a fixed amount from the previous.
